title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
**Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags**

**Product Description**

Keep your kitchen clean and organized with the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. These unscented, white trash bags are made of tear-resistant plastic material, ensuring they can withstand regular use. The 13-gallon capacity is perfect for everyday kitchen waste, and the red drawstring closure makes it easy to secure and dispose of the bag when it's full.

**Product Features**

- 50-count pack for long-lasting use
- 13-gallon capacity for everyday kitchen waste
- Unscented for odor-free disposal
- Made of tear-resistant, white plastic material for durability
- Red drawstring closure for easy and secure bag disposal
- Flex-tra strength for added tear resistance
- Compatible with Alexa voice shopping for convenient reordering

**Order Now and Keep Your Kitchen Clean and Organized**

Click the "Add to Cart" button to get your Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags today!
